text: Bradford City A.F.C. is an English football club. They are based in Bradford, West Yorkshire. They began in 1903 and play their home games in a stadium called Valley Parade. ==League position== Season League Position 2000/01 Premier League 20th 2001/02 First Division 15th 2002/03 First Division 19th 2003/04 First Division 23rd 2004/05 League One 11th 2005/06 League One 11th 2006/07 League One 22nd 2007/08 League Two 10th 2008/09 League Two 9th ===Former position=== ==References== Category:Bradford Category:English football clubs Category:1903 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:Organisations based in West Yorkshire
title: Bradford City A.F.C.
